name: Xoli
description:
GAME OVERVIEW

Are you ready to answer the questions before your offerings fall? be quick and you'll get more points.

CONCEPT

Trivia game about the day of the dead in México.

GENRE

Dungeon Crawler, 2D Adventure.

TARGET

Young players interested in indie games and popular culture. The objective of the game is to teach about the Día de Muertos traditions. Ages 8 - 12..

TEAM MEMBERS:

Carlo Vázquez-------@nyahunter_

Noél Hernández-------@hollowme_15

Diego Mejía-------@Diegus117

Ivette Valencia-----@kaivalfra

Ik Ávila------@ik.avila

GAMEPLAY

 Trivia.

OBJECTIVES

Answer the questions before the time runs out. 

MECHANICS

Point and click .

GAME OPTIONS

Start,Credits.
